survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to ensure clarity. Mobile-friendly layout recommended.

script.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing services?

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing service do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for less common services. Ensure the 'Other' field is open-ended if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-ended follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing service do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture multiple preferences. Ensure the 'Other' field is open-ended if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-ended follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most frequently used ride-sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most frequently used ride-sharing service?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your ride-sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your ride-sharing service?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience issues during your ride-sharing trips?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure issue occurrence. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How often do you experience issues during your ride-sharing trips?

questions.question_text: What types of issues have you encountered during your ride-sharing trips? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common issues. Ensure the 'Other' field is open-ended if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-ended follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What types of issues have you encountered during your ride-sharing trips? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your most frequently used ride-sharing service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure recommendation likelihood. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your most frequently used ride-sharing service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more satisfied with your ride-sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture suggestions for improvement. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would make you more satisfied with your ride-sharing service?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in using additional features offered by ride-sharing services, such as carpooling or subscription plans?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge interest in additional features. Mobile-friendly layout recommended.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in using additional features offered by ride-sharing services, such as carpooling or subscription plans?
